name: Crush Zone: Demolition Derby
storyline: CEO Eugene Austin hosts an international competition called "Crush Zone: Demolition Derby", which drivers around the word enter and compete in the gladiatorial games for the grand prize. In a match, players must do what they can to destroy the competition, whether it’s ramming them into walls and deadly traps, knocking them out of their car, or making use of the many weapons attached to their customized ride.
summary: Crush Zone: Demolition Derby is a thrilling, action multiplayer, vehicular party game. Where drivers around the word enter and compete in the gladiatorial games for the grand prize.
